decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority (before the extension is occupied).

Condition : 4 - No additional flank windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the eastern and western wall of the extension hereby approved without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 6 - The 2 metre fence on the eastern boundary shall be retained or replaced with a fence of the same height and design prior to first occupation of the extension.
description: Erection of a two storey side extension to dwellinghouse.
